13static inline uint32_t fuse_lower_32_bits(uint64_t nr)
14{
15 return (uint32_t)(nr & 0xffffffff);
16}
17
21static inline uint64_t fuse_higher_32_bits(uint64_t nr)
22{
23 return nr & ~0xffffffffULL;
24}
